isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE - REAR OIL SEAL & WEAR SLEEVE - REASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Rear Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve Installation

note.para: Flywheel housing bore concentricity and flywheel housing face runout is checked to ensure proper engine to transmission alignment.

step1.para: Check flywheel housing bore concentricity as follows:

step2.para:
Attach a dial indicator to the crankshaft and place the indicator tip against the flywheel housing bore. Refer to Figure 7.16
.
Rotate the crankshaft slowly and record the total indicator variation. Refer to "SPECIFICATIONS" for housing bore to concentricity tolerance.

figure.caption: Figure 7.14. Remove Wear Sleeve with Air Hammer and Muffler Chisel.
Figure 7.15. Tap to Expand Wear Sleeve.
Figure 7.16. Check the Concentricity of the Flywheel Housing Bore in Relation to the Axis of the Crankshaft.

step1.para: Check flywheel housing face runout as follows:

step2.para:
Attach a dial indicator to the crankshaft flange, and place the indicator tip against the flywheel housing face. Refer to Figure 7.17
.
Measure at four points, 90° apart, for total face variation.

note.para: KEEP THE CRANKSHAFT END PLAY AT ZERO IN THE SAME DIRECTION FOR ALL MEASUREMENTS.

step2.para: Refer to "SPECIFICATIONS" for flywheel housing face runout tolerance.

note.para: INSTALL THE REAR OIL SEAL AND WEAR SLEEVE AS A UNIT. DO NOT REMOVE THE SEAL FROM THE WEAR SLEEVE PRIOR TO INSTALLATION.

step1.para: Install a new rear oil seal and crankshaft wear sleeve assembly using the installer tool SE-4272 as follows:

step2.para: Clean the crankshaft flange and flywheel housing bore thoroughly. Remove any debris.

Install the centering plate from SE-4272 to the crankshaft flange using the two studs provided with the installer tool. Refer to Figure 7.18
.

Coat the I.D. of wear sleeve and O.D. of oil seal with a thin film of R.T.V. liquid gasket (Dow 732, General Electric 1473 or equivalent). DO NOT get any of this liquid on the seal lip or O.D. of the wear sleeve. Refer to Figure 7.18
.

note.para: Proper use of this tool will assure that the seal and wear sleeve are pressed onto the crankshaft flange to the proper depth.

figure.caption: Figure 7.17. Check Runout of Flywheel Housing Face.
Figure 7.18. Install Centering Plate and Apply R.T.V. to Seal and Sleeve.

step2.para:
Position oil seal and wear sleeve over centering plate and onto the crankshaft flange. Place the installer portion of SE-4272 over the centering plate and studs. Turn the forcing nut on the installer tool until the seal and sleeve is seated in the bore ( Figure 7.19
).
